title: [EBAY] Ebay Item 321636421503 - Scam - Do Not Buy

posts.content:
Half the price it should be, and set up as a classified ad to stop the buyer using PayPal.

Reported as a scam to Ebay. If item still on EBay when you read this please report it too.

Thanks
And it's not only a splitty that's going cheap from them either, so careful you don't buy their Porsches etc too !!
Saffron1981UK has now 'sold' their fleet of vehicles they had up for sale. eBay must have deleted them all.

I can't find an option to post a new thread on this forum tonight, so just a warning there's another scammer on EBay selling a fleet of vehicles at low prices. EG splitty item #321640671795.

Their userid is melb68uk. They have been reported.
Ebay were quick. Their scam items have all been deleted already
